nodes.text: Purple Werm was an establishment in a seedy part of the Coruscant underworld. It was situated right between Playland Theatre and Ihouse. The facade showed pictures of female faces and a purple Aurebesh neon sign, which spelled out the name.
During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment right across the street, while planning the Mission to the Jedi Temple.
The old Clone Wars episode guide on the official website erroneously refers to the establishment as "Purple Wer"; probably because there is no light in the last symbol.
During pre-production, the establishment was called "Felucian Loveshack", as seen in concept art of the Coruscant underworld.
